info.title: OPERA Cloud DataValueMapping Service API
info.description:
APIs which offer external systems to config and use values different than what are configured in opera

Compatible with OPERA Cloud release 25.5.0.0.

get.description:
This API allows you to get the converted hotel code

OperationId:getOperaHotelCode

parameters.name: operaHotelCode
parameters.description: Opera Resort for which conversion is needed.

200.description: Response to fetch the opera resort for an interface and given the external resort value or vice versa.

get.description:
This API allows you to get the converted values

OperationId:getConvertedValues

parameters.name: externalHotelId
parameters.description: External value of resort for which conversion is needed.

parameters.name: conversionCode
parameters.description: Enumeration of the different conversion codes needed for data value mapping.

parameters.name: valueToBeConverted
parameters.description: Value to be converted. It can be opera or external value.

parameters.name: masterValue
parameters.description: Master value is supposed to be Opera value.

200.description: Response for all the converted values.

get.description:
This API allows you to get default values

OperationId:getDefaultValues

200.description: Response for all the converted values.

get.summary: Fetch Data Value Mapping Conversion Codes
get.description:
API to fetch Data Value Mapping Conversion Codes for a given external system. Filters include optional hotelId and group (XML Type).

OperationId:getDvmConversionCodes

parameters.name: externalSystem
parameters.description: Identifier of the external system.

parameters.name: hotelId
parameters.description: Unique OPERA internal ID used to identify a Hotel in OPERA.

parameters.name: group
parameters.description: List of XML Types (groups) to filter conversion codes.

parameters.name: conversionCode
parameters.description: List of specific conversion codes to filter.

parameters.name: configuredOnly
parameters.description: If 'Y', returns only configured conversion codes for the interface. Otherwise, returns all conversion codes.

200.description: Response to fetch Data Value Mapping Conversion Codes.

204.description: No conversion codes found for the given filters.

get.summary: Fetch Data Value Mappings for specific conversion code.
get.description:
Retrieve mappings for a specific conversion code configured for external system, hotelId and Global mappings.

OperationId:getDataValueMappings

parameters.name: externalSystem
parameters.description: Identifier of the external system.

parameters.name: conversionCode
parameters.description: Type of Conversion Code configured in OPERA.

parameters.name: hotelId
parameters.description: Unique OPERA hotel Id used to identify a Hotel in OPERA.

parameters.name: scope
parameters.description: Fetch data based on scope: Filtered by All(default), Global, hotelId.

parameters.name: mappingIds
parameters.description: List of mapping Id's to filter.

parameters.name: searchText
parameters.description: Search string to filter by OPERA value, external value, or description.

post.description:
API to create Data Value Mapping (DVM) Conversion Codes by External System and Conversion Code.

OperationId:postDataValueMappings

parameters.name: externalSystem
parameters.description: Unique ID used to identify an external system.

parameters.name: conversionCode
parameters.description: Type of conversion code configured in the system.

parameters.name: conversionCodeMappingsToBeCreated
parameters.description: Request Object to Create Conversion Code Mappings.

201.description: Response Object for creating Conversion Code Mappings.

put.description:
API to update existing Data Value Mapping (DVM) Conversion Code records for a given External System and Conversion Code.

OperationId:putDataValueMappings

parameters.name: externalSystem
parameters.description: Unique Id used to identify an external system.

parameters.name: conversionCode
parameters.description: Conversion Code configured in OPERA.

parameters.name: conversionCodeMappingsToBeUpdated
parameters.description: Request to update existing Conversion Code Mappings.

200.description: Response for updating Conversion Code Mappings.

delete.description:
API to Delete Interface Mapping Conversion Codes by providing one or more Mapping IDs as query parameter.

OperationId:deleteDataValueMappings

parameters.name: externalSystem
parameters.description: External System code

parameters.name: conversionCode
parameters.description: Conversion Code

parameters.name: mappingIds
parameters.description: List of Mapping IDs to delete

200.description: Id's deleted and any failures with reasons.
